item.title: Funny Pieces of Codes Make Weekend Happier
item.description: Sunny weekends make me cheerful always, and there are also some funny pieces of codes make it greater. Hope the following codes make you smile, too. Although I hardly use Ruby programming language for a long time, I still remember a piece of code from Sidekiq, which is a asynchronous jobs framework for Ruby: # https://github.com/mperham/sidekiq/blob/5ebd857e3020d55f5c701037c2d7bedf9a18e897/lib/sidekiq.rb#L51-L53 module Sidekiq # ... def self.❨╯°□°❩╯︵┻━┻ puts "Calm down, yo." end ... end Aha! It is a unused method of which the name is a emoticon, and seems that the author of the code is annoying while he or she was writing it.
